name: Vast (itch) (minok) (minok) (minok)
description:
The game has 9 levels and one endless mode. With each level it becomes more and more difficult and interesting.

In the first level, you need to kill ten enemies of the first type.

In the thief level, the number of enemies increases and the player needs to hold out for 20 seconds.

The third level, called "Pacifist" differs from the others in that

that you need to hold out for 20 seconds without destroying enemies.

In the fourth level, the player must constantly move in order to pass 10,000 pixels.

In the fifth level, obstacles appear behind which you can hide from projectiles.

In the sixth level, it becomes even more difficult. Enemies have homing bullets. The player will have to react faster to this danger.

The last three levels are quite difficult. The player is waiting for severe trials in which he will have to apply everything that he has learned earlier.

By pressing the "Infinite" button, the player needs to hold out as long as possible. All kinds of enemies are encountered in this game mode.
